meanings.sent1: The landslidden area was dangerous to walk on.
meanings.sent2: The road was closed due to the landslidden rocks.
meanings.sent3: The landslidden hill looked like a giant puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The landslidden terrain resembled a crumpled paper.
meanings.sent5: The landslidden ground was a chaotic mess of rocks and soil.

meanings.sent1: After heavy rain, the hill landslidden, causing damage.
meanings.sent2: The village landslidden last year, but no one was hurt.
meanings.sent3: The mountain landslidden unexpectedly during the night.
meanings.sent4: The cliff landslidden with a deafening roar.
meanings.sent5: The valley landslidden, changing its appearance forever.
